name: Fairy Cubes HD
description:
It's a 3D mahjong with a twist.

Fairy Cubes is a highly innovative and addictive 3D skill-based puzzle game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun games in the App Store.
Fairy Cubes combines mahjong and match three game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements


Gamers Quotes
